files.purpose: Mileage Log Automation Script Version 8.1 [09/10-11:00AM EST] by Claude Opus 4.1 Features:
QBO ESTIMATES - QuickBooks Online Integration Version# [01/06-10:30AM EST] - Complete estimate and invoice management by Claude Opus 4.1
files.version: [01/06-10:30AM EST] - Complete estimate and invoice management

functions.name: convertEstimateToInvoice
functions.description: Convert estimate to invoice for awarded jobs Run this from Awarded sheet with active cell on the row to convert

functions.name: processAllAwardedEstimates
functions.description: Process all rows in Awarded sheet that have estimates but no invoices

functions.name: sendEstimateCurrentRow_
functions.description: Send estimate for current row in Leads sheet to QuickBooks

functions.name: findOrCreateCustomer_
functions.description: Helper: Find existing customer or create new one in QuickBooks

functions.name: parseAddress_
functions.description: Helper: Parse address string into QuickBooks address object

functions.name: configureEnvironment
functions.description: Configure QuickBooks environment (production vs sandbox)

functions.name: listQuickBooksItems
functions.description: Debug: List all QuickBooks items (for line item configuration)

functions.name: getScriptUrl
functions.description: Get the current web app URL - MUST run this after deploying as web app

functions.name: getOAuthService
functions.description: Initialize OAuth2 service for QuickBooks

functions.name: resetAuth
functions.description: Clear stored authentication credentials

functions.name: authorize
functions.description: Triggered from menu → "Authorize QuickBooks" Opens authorization in a modal with a clickable link

functions.name: authCallback
functions.description: OAuth2 callback handler

functions.name: doGet
functions.description: Web app entry point - MUST be deployed as web app

functions.name: testQuickBooksConnection_
functions.description: Test QuickBooks connection

functions.name: showRedirectUri_
functions.description: Helper function to show current redirect URI and setup instructions

functions.description: Check all folders in a single sheet and highlight empty ones

functions.description: Install daily folder check trigger (7am)
